channel.title: I need help really badly
channel.description: I can't get on my server, but other people are on. When I connect as the IP as 127.0.0.1 it says my IP is localhost and won't connect. When I try the server IP as KeijiScape.no-ip.org it does my no-ip org IP address and it doesn't connect. No matter what I do the MoparScape client freezes. I really need help. I am so confused! :confused:

Snark the window disappears because you have to type in cmd then run that and type in ipconfig which will make your ip + your routers ip and other stuff show up

item.title: I need help really badly
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

I got it. I just restarted my computer. Also it’s easiest to open Command Prompt and to type IPConfig.

Mods please close!

Read full topic

item.title: I need help really badly
item.dc:creator: @Snark Snark
item.description:
@Snark wrote:

Usually you can connect using 127.0.0.1 but, if that isnt working you could try connecting using your LAN IP address.

Go to your start menu > Run > And type ipconfig in the window. If the window disappears make a .bat file with

ipconfig
pause

In it then run it, It will tell you your IP address, If this doesnt fix your problem then try checking your server’s port again.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help really badly
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

Snark:

Are you using the correct port? And you can not use your external IP when connecting to localhost.

Yes I am using the right port so how do I connect through my regular IP? I don’t think I did anything to change it.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2007, 06:49:12 PM[/size][hr]Can anyone help?!?

Read full topic
